Wrath: Hmm...Sound good to me! *Wrath says to Inzola*
  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July =
23, 2000 9:05 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Deemos just stares at hi=
m.

  "Wrath, we could go and find someone to slag." Inzola said...
    ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
    Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:44 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast=
 Wars


    Wrath: I don't really know......Damn... I never plan ahead! Hmm=
...I haven't been aound for to long...Hmm... *Wrath continues thinking of s=
omething to do*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
  =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:19 AM
   =
   Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Deemos and Inzola walk to the jungle=
 with Wrath.

      "Who are we hunting?" Deemos asked...
        ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:08 AM
        Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


        *Wrath begins walking for the jungle*
          -=
---- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:02 AM
          Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          "Yes, let's go." Inzola said to Wrath..=
.
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizar=
ds 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, July 22=
, 2000 4:53 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            Wrath:=
 We could try jungle? *Wrath asks Deemos*
              ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
              Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:39 AM
              Subjec=
t: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              "It's up to you where we start." Deem=
os said to Wrath...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
       From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
     =
           Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:27 AM
                Subject: R=
e: Neo Beast Wars


                *Wrath nods and smiles* Wrath: Where sh=
ould start? *Wrath asks Inzola and Deemos*
                  ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
   =
               Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  "Hunting? We=
 hunted down almost everyone already, but sure, we'll come." Inzola said.

=
                  "Good to practice with our new beast modes." Deemos said.=
 He patted Wrath on the shoulder.

                  "Those Alliance and Pr=
eds will be sorry they wouldn't let us join!" Deemos said. Inzola looked at=
 Wrath.

                  "The Maximals, most of them just don't got it, b=
ut a few stand out, you are one of those few." Inzola said to Wrath...
    =
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: ilo=
vealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                 =
   Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
                    Subject: Re: N=
eo Beast Wars


                    *Wrath smiles* Wrath: Well......We can =
go scouting...hmm....I've haven't had much to do...We go hunting? *Wrath as=
ks Deemos and Inzola*
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
                     From: THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
                      Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
        =
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                      Inzola sm=
iles and shakes Wrath's hand.

                      "Nice to meet such a c=
harming and powerful bot upon my repair." Inzola said. Deemos and Inzola hu=
gged for about 5 seconds and then looked back to Wrath.

                  =
    "So, what are we supposed to do right now?" Deemos asked Wrath...
     =
                   ----- Original Message ----- 
                        Fr=
om: ilovealllizards 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
                  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:53 AM
                  =
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                        Wrath: I am Wra=
th and you must be the Inzola that Deemos spoke about. A pleasure to meet y=
ou. *Wrath extends his hand for a hand shake*
                          ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
                          From: THECODE 
       =
                   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: =
Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:20 AM
                          Subject: Neo Bea=
st Wars


                          Deemos looked at the CR Chamber when it=
 beeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

                          "Max=
imal base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos laughed.

        =
                  "Who are you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

                     =
     Gangon's spark is still waiting.

                          Artist run=
s around in a circle, playing his stupid games he believed exercises him. H=
e runs away from the Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs into the mount=
ain and an avalanche starts, Artist is burried, various thoughts pass throu=
gh his mind. Hours later, he awakes.

                          "Oh, that w=
as some blow, but I'll go with the flow." Artist said.

                   =
       "Plintissa? Where are you my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist=
 called out. He remembered that she was in the desert. His comm unit and co=
mpass were working, so he ran to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him cold=
ly.

                          "Plintissa dear? You don't remember me? For =
me death was near." Artist said. Plintissa looked up in shock and flew into=
 Artist's arms. Artist laughed and they kissed. After the kiss.

          =
                "Do me a favor, Artist, stop using rhymes." Plintissa said.=
 She kissed him.

                          "Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll hav=
e a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They both laughed and Artist took Plinti=
ssa to a grassy plain.

                          Dracona held up her scann=
ing device in front of Scorponok's face.

                          "I can =
find that device I lost." Dracona said.

                          "Then I'=
ll give it to the Predacons, it's a piece of my blaster, it is an ice gun."=
 Dracona said. She looked at Scorponok with big beautiful eyes. Sinister an=
d Sinesis stared at her, mouths agape.

                          The Radic=
ons sat there still...
